Key Match Events: Joel Embiid recorded a season-high 37 points, including using his left hand and driving to the basket when double-teamed.
Post-Match Reflections: Philadelphia coach Nick Nurse stated that the team is starting to play better and is focusing on defense.
Paul George, Caleb Martin, and Kelly Oubre are making significant contributions defensively together.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Joel Embiid had eight steals and spearheaded a strong defensive performance creating 36 points off Portland turnovers.
